title: Smoked Vegetables Base
description: This is a base recipe and any combination of vegetables can be used.
directions: 1. In a bowl combine olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, salt, pepper and whisk until all is well blended. This will be the Vinaigrette.
2. Place all the vegetables in a 8-by-12-inch casserole dish.
3. Pour the balsamic vinaigrette over the vegetables and toss, making sure the vegetables are well coated.
4. Put the dish of vegetables in a 225°F smoker for about 4 hours.
5. These can also be baked in a 350°F preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
ingredients: 1 medium red onion, cut into wedges
1 red pepper, seeded and cut into strips
6 small red potatoes, cut into chunks
